item.title: CVE-2024-43224|2024-08-13T14:06:44.741Z -- yuri%20baranov -- yamaps%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Yuri Baranov YaMaps for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects YaMaps for WordPress: from n/a through 0.6.27.
